content: meet the love bug a tiny crocheted creature stitched full of warmth and affection with its heart-shaped wings this lovable little bug is a perfect symbol of love friendship and handmade care this pattern guides you step by step through creating your own love bug making it suitable even for beginners whether you make it in classic reds and pinks or experiment with your own color palette each love bug turns out uniquely adorable perfect for valentine s day anniversaries or just because - this little bug is guaranteed to spread love wherever it goes **copyrights** please remember that this pattern is for personal use only you should not claim it as your own the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern in a limited number but remember to credit me as a designer by adding my name pracownia blask or my handle @pracowniablask to your item or your item description if you have any questions encounter difficulties or notice any issues while using pracownia blask patterns please contact me at pracowniablask@gmail com © 2026 by jakub pilarski pracownia blask all rights reserved
